thread.title_full: NeurAxis (NASDAQ:NRXS) Stock Price Up 9.6% - Here's Why - Defense World

author: Defense World Staff
title: NeurAxis (NASDAQ:NRXS) Stock Price Up 9.6% - Here's Why - Defense World
text:
NeurAxis, Inc. ( NASDAQ:NRXS – Get Free Report ) shares rose 9.6% during mid-day trading on Wednesday . The company traded as high as $3.89 and last traded at $3.8150. Approximately 98,253 shares were traded during trading, a decline of 84% from the average daily volume of 598,177 shares. The stock had previously closed at $3.48. Separately, Craig Hallum upped their price objective on shares of NeurAxis from $7.00 to $8.00 and gave the company a “buy” rating in a report on Monday. One research analyst has rated the stock with a Buy rating, According to data from MarketBeat.com, NeurAxis has an average rating of “Buy” and a consensus target price of $8.00. Get Our Latest Stock Report on NeurAxis The company has a market capitalization of $40.64 million, a PE ratio of -2.07 and a beta of 3.13. The firm has a 50-day moving average of $2.85 and a two-hundred day moving average of $2.69. Several large investors have recently made changes to their positions in NRXS. Wealthcare Advisory Partners LLC acquired a new stake in NeurAxis during the second quarter valued at $37,000. Money Concepts Capital Corp acquired a new position in shares of NeurAxis in the third quarter worth about $103,000. Citadel Advisors LLC boosted its stake in shares of NeurAxis by 39.6% during the 3rd quarter. Citadel Advisors LLC now owns 35,627 shares of the company’s stock worth $110,000 after acquiring an additional 10,103 shares in the last quarter. Manatuck Hill Partners LLC purchased a new stake in shares of NeurAxis during the 2nd quarter worth about $122,000. Finally, AIGH Capital Management LLC grew its position in shares of NeurAxis by 1,913.2% during the 2nd quarter. AIGH Capital Management LLC now owns 400,000 shares of the company’s stock valued at $968,000 after acquiring an additional 380,131 shares during the period. 11.77% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds. ( Get Free Report )
NeurAxis (NASDAQ: NRXS) is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on the discovery and development of therapeutic candidates for diseases of the central nervous system. The company leverages a proprietary approach to deliver small molecules and biologics across the blood–brain barrier, aiming to address conditions ranging from acute neural injury to chronic neurodegenerative disorders. NeurAxis advances its pipeline through a combination of in-house research, external collaborations with academic medical centers and contract research organizations, and strategic licensing agreements.
